Name: Relief of Two Papyrus Boats
Description: This low-relief shows a beautiful nature scene of two boats made of papyrus in the marshes of the Delta. In addition to the crew, the boats are carrying animals including a small oxen. Several details add life and realism to the scene including the boy at the end of the boat reaching out to a papyrus plant, the man feeding an ox with his hand in its mouth, then a bird holding a papyrus plant in its beak. And the papyrus plants themselves shown both straight and bent as if moving in the wind.
